description: Another hero of this work . As one of the doll nights, manages Satoshi. It is usually placed in the Kayama family in the form of a doll. The image color is red. When the owner (Rika Kayama) of the red calling ring (bracelet) summons it or senses her danger, the calling pendant emits light to inform it and activates by casting a spell. After that, they act autonomously, become huge like a human and appear under the owner. Furthermore, it transforms into Super Doll Rica in battle mode to save the owner`s crisis. It has a special yo-yo type weapon "Light Spinner" and exerts all-purpose power such as throwing, capturing, defending, and radiating energy. Rika, the successor to the throne, is called "Rika-sama" or "princess-sama." The activation spell is "Turule, Cleure, Turreiro, Crayra".
name: Doll Rika
